Ally_Debuff.help: Allies who can return to battle have lowered damage.

Punch.help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
Punch.targetHelp: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

Haymaker.help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Haymaker.targetHelp: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Hurl.help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.targetHelp: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Super_Leap.help: Blunt Trauma can Leap to building tops without problem.
Super_Leap.targetHelp: Blunt Trauma can Leap to building tops without problem.

Panic.help: The Civilian is panicked by the carnage.

Resistance.help: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.
Resistance.targetHelp: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.

Lancer_Shot.help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegrate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Lancer_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Stun, Special
Lancer_Shot.targetHelp: You have disoriented by the Lancer Shot's impact.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} pierces {PlayerDest} for {Damage} points of energy damage!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} pierces you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of energy damage!

Power_Bolt.help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.targetHelp: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Explosion.help: The Aspect of Rularuu is protected by the Willforge.
Explosion.targetHelp: The Aspect of Rularuu is protected by the Willforge.

Summon.help: This high-tech device was given to you by Psimon Omega. When used on victims of Rikti experimentation it activates their latent psychic powers but causing them to fly into a blind rage and attack your nearest enemy. This device has 20 charges.
Summon.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented by a Psionic Activator.

Lightning_Bolt.help: The Caster can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance. Recharge: Fast

TheTell.help: A focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. Zapp drains Endurance, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Some of the Endurance you drain may transfer back to you. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
